verbose_text: Consistent with previously reported data in allergen exposed mice, OVA-RSV challenged mice exhibited loss of the AE junction molecule E-cadherin compared with control mice as shown by RT-qPCR (XREF_FIG) and western blotting (XREF_FIG), while OVA-RSV only decreased Claudin-18 mRNA expression (XREF_FIG) and not protein levels (XREF_FIG).
evidence: loss of the AE junction molecule E-cadherin
